item.title: PikrellCam Motion-detection plus temperature Logger
item.author: Luca Cipressi
item.description: PiKrellCam Reborn Motion Detection with Sensor Data Logger One of the most used motion detection and surveillance software for the Raspberry Pi with additional temperature and humidity logging and graph panel. Sensor logger UI panel This fork introduces an additional web-dashboard driven by a sqlite database to keep track of temperature and humidity readings coming from a HDC1080 sensor. This dashboard is accessible by the main page of the camera preview bringing in some statistics of the collected data.
